EmailTemplate.description: English Language template with master customer fields to provide customer with a general email from a case.
EmailTemplate.name: CMS Support General Email From Case Template (GBEN)
EmailTemplate.subject: Lilly CMS: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Update For {!Account.Title_Desc_GLBL__c} {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
www.lilly.com
Eli Lilly and Company
Dear {!Account.Title_Desc_GLBL__c} {!Account.Name},
{!Case.Last_Case_Comment}
Kind Regards,
Lilly Customer Meeting Services
